concept.title: The d4p javascript object reference
concept.shortdesc: The d4p javascript object allows developper to bring more user interface objects into the content.

conbody.p: The d4p object has been developped to be very modular, every objects should be easy to replaced if one of them does not do the job you need.

The d4p object has been programmed using the library. This does not mean that jQuery has to be used to develop custom modules, but jQuery has to be includes if you want to use the d4p objects and others modules.

The d4p objects use AJAX techniques to load the content. The URI changed is triggered using the hashchange event. We will remove the hashchange once the new history api will be fully supported; this will allow to modify the URL without reloading the page.
